item.title: Npcdialoug help?
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hey, i have another problem. whats wrong?
When i talk with my npc he says this: “Hello, “+playerName+””, “I can change your characters look.” and then i hit next he says the same why?

i added this in client.java with all the ohers

if(NPCID == 2676) { NpcDialogue = 124; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

i added this in client.java with all the others

			case 124:
				talk2("Hello, "+playerName+"", "I can change your characters look.", 2676);
			break;
			case 125:
				talk("This will only cost you 5,000 Coins", 2676);
			break;
			case 126:
				if(playerHasItem(955, 5000))
				{
				showInterface(3559);
				apset = true;
				}
				else
				{
				talk("I'm sorry but you need 5,000 Coints go get a make over.", 2676);
				}		
				break;

Read full topic
